players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
You: "Bob, I think Diana is the mafia."
Diana: "Alice, you know I'm detective, so you can't accuse me. I saw you kill Charlie. Bob was silent."
Diana: "Alice, I investigated you and found you are mafia. You killed Charlie. Bob was silent."
Bob: "Diana, you claimed to be detective and that you investigated Alice. But you also claimed to see Alice kill Charlie, which is impossible. So you are lying. I think you are mafia."
You: "Bob, I think Diana is the mafia. She is suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob, I think Diana is the mafia."
You: "Alice, you know I'm detective, so you can't accuse me. I saw you kill Charlie. Bob was silent."
You: "Alice, I investigated you and found you are mafia. You killed Charlie. Bob was silent."
Bob: "Diana, you claimed to be detective and that you investigated Alice. But you also claimed to see Alice kill Charlie, which is impossible. So you are lying. I think you are mafia."
Alice: "Bob, I think Diana is the mafia. She is suspicious."
